Title: Resolutely smash the new counterattack by the capitalist reactionary line!
Designer: Workers, Peasants, Soldiers, Artists United Rebel Corps (工农兵美术工作者联合造反兵团重)
Publisher: Xinhua Bookstore Headquarters of the Revolutionary Rebellion Command of the Shanghai Publishing System (上海出版系统革命造反司令部新华书店指挥部代发)
Notes: On the small piece of paper bottom left: 金錢 (money). Top left is a Mao quotation.
